channel.title: CVE Feed for Honeywell -- Experion PKS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Honeywell -- Experion PKS

item.title: CVE-2014-9189|2024-08-06T13:40:23.163Z -- honeywell -- experion%20pks
item.description: Multiple stack-based buffer overflow vulnerabilities were found in Honeywell Experion PKS all versions prior to R400.6, all versions prior to R410.6, and all versions prior to R430.2 modules that could lead to possible remote code execution, dynamic memory corruption, or denial of service. Honeywell strongly encourages and recommends all customers running unsupported versions of EKPS prior to R400 to upgrade to a supported version.

item.title: CVE-2014-9187|2024-08-06T13:40:24.531Z -- honeywell -- experion%20pks
item.description: Multiple heap-based buffer overflow vulnerabilities exist in Honeywell Experion PKS all versions prior to R400.6, all versions prior to R410.6, and all versions prior to R430.2 modules, which could lead to possible remote code execution or denial of service. Honeywell strongly encourages and recommends all customers running unsupported versions of EKPS prior to R400 to upgrade to a supported version.

item.title: CVE-2014-5436|2024-08-06T11:41:49.329Z -- honeywell -- experion%20pks
item.description: A directory traversal vulnerability exists in the confd.exe module in Honeywell Experion PKS R40x before R400.6, R41x before R410.6, and R43x before R430.2, which could lead to possible information disclosure. Honeywell strongly encourages and recommends all customers running unsupported versions of EKPS prior to R400 to upgrade to a supported version.

item.title: CVE-2014-5435|2024-08-06T11:41:49.065Z -- honeywell -- experion%20pks
item.description: An arbitrary memory write vulnerability exists in the dual_onsrv.exe module in Honeywell Experion PKS R40x before R400.6, R41x before R410.6, and R43x before R430.2, that could lead to possible remote code execution or denial of service. Honeywell strongly encourages and recommends all customers running unsupported versions of EKPS prior to R400 to upgrade to a supported version.

item.title: CVE-2014-9186|2024-08-06T13:40:24.560Z -- honeywell -- experion%20pks
item.description: A file inclusion vulnerability exists in the confd.exe module in Honeywell Experion PKS R40x before R400.6, R41x before R410.6, and R43x before R430.2, which could lead to accepting an arbitrary file into the function, and potential information disclosure or remote code execution. Honeywell strongly encourages and recommends all customers running unsupported versions of EKPS prior to R400 to upgrade to a supported version.
